roleset.name: to make a mess of
roleset.note: BOTCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'botch' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from botch.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: A new specialty court was sought [*-1] by patent experts , who [*T*-2]believed that the generalists had botched too many important , multimillion-dollar cases .
